title: 이달의소녀탐구 #158 (LOONA TV #158)
summary:
0:02 -- Kim Lip has to rap in SiTR but she doesn’t want to. She is practicing but she really
doesn’t want to.
0:23 -- “Unnie, you’ll rap when you arrive here.” (Asking HaSeul to rap)
0:35 -- HaSeul changes to match the girl crush concept of the MV. But HeeJin really
wants to do that. (And Heekki does it in the end).
